details: The Quickcreator â€“ AI Blog Writer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in versions 0.0.9 to 0.1.17 through the /wp-content/plugins/quickcreator/dupasrala.txt file. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view the plugin's API key and subsequently use that to perform actions on the site like creating new posts and injecting XSS payloads.
